description: Sen. Amy Klobuchar, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent & Mayor Zohran Mamdani were on "This Week" Sunday, January 25. This is a rush transcript and may be updated.
title: 'This Week' Transcript 1-25-26: Sen. Amy Klobuchar, Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent & New York City Mayor Zohran Mamdani

description: The White House penguin post connects to a popular TikTok meme where young men see the solitary bird as rejecting conformity for a higher purpose.
title: Trump's penguin breaks the internet — and sends the left into a frenzy

description: On "This Week," Secretary Bessent discusses President Trump's framework Greenland deal and tariffs on Canada.
title: Bessent: Greenland deal is ‘much more fulsome’ for the US

description: European leaders are finding a way to speak with one voice against President Donald Trump and they're increasingly willing to say “no” to his demands
title: Getting to 'no': Europe's leaders find a way to speak with one voice against Trump

description: Tensions over U.S. President Donald Trump's plans to control Greenland have caused a rift between MAGA and Europe's far-right
title: Trump's Greenland ambitions strain MAGA ties with Europe's far-right

title: Republican calls are growing for a deeper investigation into the fatal Minneapolis shooting

description: President's Trump's designs on acquiring the world's largest island "one way or the other" have stirred feelings of betrayal among Danes and Greenlanders. Mo Rocca gives us a history lesson about an island that is 80 percent covered in ice.
title: How Trump's designs on Greenland are testing the U.S.-Denmark alliance

description: The following is the transcript of the interview with Kirsten Hillman, the Canadian ambassador to the U.S., that aired on "Face the Nation with Margaret Brennan" on Jan. 25, 2026.
title: Transcript: Canadian ambassador Kirsten Hillman on "Face the Nation with Margaret Brennan," Jan. 25, 2026

description: The United States and Denmark are longtime allies. But when it comes to Greenland, President's Trump's designs on acquiring the world's largest island "one way or the other" have stirred feelings of betrayal among Danes and Greenlanders. Mo Rocca gives us a history lesson about the geographical, economic and cultural importance of an island that is 80 percent covered in ice.
title: Why Greenland? All about the world's largest island

description: President's Trump's designs on acquiring the world's largest island "one way or the other" have stirred feelings of betrayal among Danes and Greenlanders. Mo Rocca gives us a history lesson about an island that is 80 percent covered in ice.

description: In his memoir, "Where We Keep the Light," Pennsylvania's governor writes about how his childhood helped shape his lifetime of public service. He talks about the challenges he faced while growing up; the rise in political violence in America; and his future in the Democratic Party.
title: A conversation with Josh Shapiro on a life of service and faith

description: The history of ancient Greece teaches us that the lasting formula for maintaining global power over time is through mutually beneficial alliances, not brute strength and coercion.
title: Trade an alliance for an island? That’s a bad deal | CNN Politics

description: President Trump has asked Israeli President Isaac Herzog to pardon Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu in his corruption trial. Will Herzog do it? Fareed asks him at the World Economic Forum in Davos, Switzerland.
title: On GPS: Fareed asks Israel’s President if he will pardon Netanyahu | CNN

description: In an exclusive interview with Meet the Press, Deputy Attorney General Todd Blanche says the fatal shooting of a Minneapolis resident by a border control agent would have “never happened” if there was more support from local law enforcement and officials.
title: Todd Blanche says federal agents ‘acting humanely’ amid public outcry: Full interview

description: The stock market under President Donald Trump’s first year back in the White House saw the weakest performance during a president’s first year since 2004, when George Bush started the second term of his presidency.
title: Trump’s stock market: Worst first year of a term since George W. Bush | CNN Business

description: The head of Airbus has warned staff that the plane maker must be ready to adapt to unsettling new geopolitical risks after facing "significant" logistical and financial damage from US protectionism and US-China trade tensions last year.
title: Airbus CEO warns of new risks after ‘significant’ from trade tensions

description: There’s a popular saying among fans of tech billionaire Elon Musk: Never bet against him
title: Online bettors mint money on Elon Musk's misses

description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent trashed Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney for cutting a deal with China on electric vehicles, warning the US neighbor of penalties if it lets Beijing "dump goods" in America.
title: Bessent trashes Canada’s PM as Trump bemoans China ‘completely taking over’ US neighbor

description: The popularity of Trump's immigration crackdown, and approval of ICE's tactics have dropped. Also, there's fallout from the World Economic Forum, including Trump's new tariff threat against Canada.

description: The meeting will mark the first since Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell confirmed he is under investigation by the Department of Justice.

description: Trump's posture toward Greenland has caused weeks of headaches for GOP lawmakers. They're happy he struck a NATO deal, but the details remain unclear.
